description: This source file implements financial data analysis functions, including selection of stock price endpoints within a date range, and computation of growth metrics for given tickers using a finance client. It defines data structures, helper functions, and a main analysis function.

classes.name: SeriesSelection
classes.description: Data structure representing selected start and end points within available stock price bars, including optional indices, dates, prices, and warnings.

methods.name: Optional[float] _select_price(bar: PriceBar, field: PriceField)
methods.description: Selects the appropriate price from a PriceBar based on the specified PriceField.

methods.name: SeriesSelection _pick_endpoints(bars: List[PriceBar], field: PriceField, start_target: date | None = None, end_target: date | None = None)
methods.description: Finds the nearest start and end indices in a list of PriceBars around target dates, moving inward to skip unavailable prices, with fallback logic when data is missing or outside range.

methods.name: Tuple[List[GrowthResult],List[str]] analyze_growth(req: AnalyzeGrowthRequest, client: FinanceClient)
methods.description: Main function that computes growth results for a list of stock tickers over a specified date range, utilizing a finance client to fetch data, handling errors and missing data, filtering results based on growth criteria, and returning a sorted, limited list of results with warnings.

ctags.name: _pick_endpoints
ctags.pattern: /^def _pick_endpoints(bars: List[PriceBar], field: PriceField, start_target: date | None = None, e/
ctags.signature: (bars: List[PriceBar], field: PriceField, start_target: date | None = None, end_target: date | None = None)
